string.text: Well, there the Generators are... Ghost will lead us to Lab X-2 I'll have to get into. I'm just hoping we're not doing it for nothing...
Here we go again: the lab is surrounded by some Monolith cutthroats. Ghost decided to distract them, and I must get rearwards them through an underground tunnel while he's still there, then attack.
Wow, did it... have it just worked? I need to meet Ghost at the cemetery - just as we agreed.
That signal... something's telling me I should go towards it.
